english.segment1: Hear our prayer. Spirit, come. How I long for. Your sweet touch.
english.segment2: On my knees. I cry out. Jesus, Savior. Behold your child.
english.segment3: Chorus. Like a deer longing for water. My soul yearns;. Only you can fill my deep hunger. My heart burns. My heart burns.
english.segment4: Oceans deep. Mountains high. O my God, I cannot live without your love;. I cannot live without your love.
